 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקּוּד‎</span>]<sub>24</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ps.19.9|Ps 19:9]]</sup> ==precept== (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; properly ***thing appointed, charge, compare*** √ **B 2**), in Psalms (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — only plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקּוּדֵי י‎</span> [[Ps.19.9|Ps 19:9]], and suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקּוּדָיו‎</span> [[Ps.111.7|Ps 111:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקֻּדָיו‎</span> [[Ps.103.18|Ps 103:18]] elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקּוּדֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.119.15|Ps 119:15]]; [[Ps.119.27|Ps 119:27]] + 10 t. 119 + v[[Ps.119.128|Ps 119:128]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקּוּדֵי כֹל‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] and most); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּקֻּדֶיךָ‎</span> v[[Ps.119.4|Ps 119:4]] v[[Ps.119.45|Ps 119:45]] +6 t. 119.
